title: Memory
description: A fun and interactive memory game where players flip cards to find matching pairs while improving their concentration and memory skills. The game features a timer, move counter, and engaging animations for a dynamic user experience.

title: Predecessor Quiz
description: A Quiz site for Predecessor, a MOBA game, where players guess the champion's name or abilities based on given clues. Points are awarded for correct answers, and players can enjoy a second mode where they identify the champion's abilities, adding an extra layer of challenge.

title: Spotify Clone
description: Spotify Clone is a music platform designed specifically for enthusiasts, mimicking the user-friendly interface of Spotify.

title: Jira Ticket Clone
description: Jira Ticket Clone: A project management tool that replicates the core functionalities of Jira for efficient task and project tracking.
